SUB_W17_FUNC_COMM_CHECK_POSITION_000_PLN.speaker: UI
SUB_W17_FUNC_COMM_CHECK_POSITION_000_PLN.text: The enemy has taken this location!

SUB_W17_FUNC_COMM_LOSE_EVENT_TUT_000_PLN.speaker: UI
SUB_W17_FUNC_COMM_LOSE_EVENT_TUT_000_PLN.text:
The castle has dispatched reinforcements!
The situation was resolved without incident.

SUB_W17_FUNC_COMM_REBEL_000_PLN_000_000.speaker: UI
SUB_W17_FUNC_COMM_REBEL_000_PLN_000_000.text:
The rebel army has appeared!
Trouble awaits if they aren't dealt with.

SUB_W17_FUNC_COMM_GAMEOVER_000_PLN_000_0.speaker: UI
SUB_W17_FUNC_COMM_GAMEOVER_000_PLN_000_0.text: The castle has fallen to the rebels!

SUB_W17_FUNC_COMM_RESTART_000_PLN_000_01.speaker: UI
SUB_W17_FUNC_COMM_RESTART_000_PLN_000_01.text: Choose the rebel army's difficulty level.

SUB_W17_FUNC_COMM_RESTART_000_PLN_000_05.speaker: UI
SUB_W17_FUNC_COMM_RESTART_000_PLN_000_05.text:
- Triumph over chaos before the rebels take the castle.
- Do not leave the rebels to their own devices.
- Use the legendary weapon if you don't think you can win.
